search.query:
index=temp sourcetype=Samsung_ODS_LTE_Accessibility_View OR sourcetype=Samsung_ODS_LTE_Availability_View OR sourcetype=Samsung_ODS_LTE_Integrity_View OR sourcetype=Samsung_ODS_LTE_Mobility_View OR sourcetype=Samsung_ODS_LTE_Retainability_View OR sourcetype=Samsung_ODS_LTE_Utilisation_View OR sourcetype=Samsung_ODS_LTE_RF_RSSI
NE_NAME=$site$
| bin span=15m _time | stats min(ErabRetainability_pct) as ERAB_retainability sum(RrcConnEstab_Succ_count) as RRC_connection_Succ, sum(RrcConnEstab_Att_count) as RRC_connection_Att, sum(S1sigConnEstab_Succ_count) as S1_connection_Succ, sum(S1sigConnEstab_Att_count) as S1_connection_Att, sum(ErabEstabInit_SuccNbr_count) as ERAB_Succ, sum(ErabEstabInit_AttNbr_count) as ERAB_Att, sum(ReadCellUnavailableTime_s) as ReadCellUnavailableTime, sum(CellAvailPmPeriodTime_s) as CellAvailPmPeriodTime, sum(PdcpUL_SduLoss_count) AS PdcpSduLossULNum, sum(PdcpUL_SduTotal_count) AS PdcpSduTotalULNum, sum(PdcpDL_SduLoss_count) AS PdcpSduLossDLNum, sum(PdcpDL_SduTotal_count) AS PdcpSduTotalDLNum, sum(MacUL_IpThroughput_kbytes) as MacUL_IpThroughput_kbytes, sum(MacUL_IpThroughput_ms) as MacUL_IpThroughput_ms, sum(RlcDL_IpThroughput_kbytes) as RlcDL_IpThroughput_kbytes , sum(RlcDL_IpThroughput_ms) as RlcDL_IpThroughput_ms, sum(CSFBPsHoUtranAtt_count) as CSFBPsHoUtranAtt, sum(CSFBPsHoUtranSucc_count) as CSFBPsHoUtranSucc, sum(CSFBRedirUtranAtt_count) as CSFBRedirUtranAtt, sum(CSFBRedirUtranSucc_count) as CSFBRedirUtranSucc, sum(CsfbToUtranAtt_count) as CsfbToUtranAtt, sum(CsfbToUtranSucc_count) as CsfbToUtranSucc, sum(IntraEnbSucc_count) as IntraEnbSucc, sum(IntraEnbAtt_count) as IntraEnbAtt, sum(InterS1OutAtt_count) as InterS1OutAtt, sum(InterS1OutSucc_count) as InterS1OutSucc, sum(InterX2OutAtt_count) as InterX2OutAtt, sum(InterX2OutSucc_count) as InterX2OutSucc, sum(EnbQciDLByte_kbytes) as EnbQciDLByte, sum(AveInterferencePowerPUSCH) as AveInterferencePowerPUSCH, by _time, NE_NAME, CELL_NUM | fillnull value=0

index=temp source=Samsung_ODS_NR_Accessibility_View OR source=Samsung_ODS_NR_Availability_View OR source=Samsung_ODS_NR_Integrity_View OR source=Samsung_ODS_NR_Integrity_UPC_View OR source=Samsung_ODS_NR_RF_RSSI OR source=Samsung_ODS_NR_Utilisation_PRB OR source=Samsung_ODS_NR_Utilisation_CCE OR source=Samsung_ODS_NR_Utilisation NE_NAME=$site$ | stats min(EndcAddSuccess_pct) as InitSgNBAddSuccRate, sum(CellAvailability_pct) as CellAvailability, sum(DL_UEThroughput_kbps) as DL_UEThroughput, sum(UL_UEThroughput_kbps) as UL_UEThroughput, sum(AveRecIntPowerPUSCH) as AveRecIntPowerPUSCH sum(DLTotalPRBUtil) as DLTotalPRBUtil sum(ULTotalPRBUtil) as ULTotalPRBUtil sum(PDCCHCCEUtilization) as PDCCHCCEUtilization by _time, NE_NAME, CellIdentity | fillnull value=0
index=temp sourcetype=samsung* | stats count by NE_NAME | where NOT (NE_NAME LIKE "%-%") | eval NE_NAME=substr(NE_NAME,1,4) | fields- count | dedup NE_NAME
index=temp sourcetype=samsung* NE_NAME=$site$* | stats count by CELL_NUM
index=temp sourcetype=samsung* NE_NAME=$site$* | stats count by CellIdentity

index=temp source=Samsung_ODS_NR_Accessibility_View | stats min(EndcAddSuccess_pct) as InitSgNBAddSuccRate by _time, NE_NAME | timechart fixedrange=f span=15m min(InitSgNBAddSuccRate) as InitSgNBAddSuccRate BY NE_NAME
search CellIdentity=$5gcell$ | timechart fixedrange=f span=15m min(DLTotalPRBUtil) as DLTotalPRBUtil BY CellIdentity
search CellIdentity=$5gcell$ | timechart fixedrange=f span=15m min(ULTotalPRBUtil) as ULTotalPRBUtil BY CellIdentity
search CellIdentity=$5gcell$ | timechart fixedrange=f span=15m min(PDCCHCCEUtilization) as PDCCHCCEUtilization BY CellIdentity
search CellIdentity=$5gcell$ | timechart fixedrange=f span=15m min(CellAvailability) as CellAvailability by CellIdentity

chart.title: $site$ - NR Average Downlink UE Throughput Kbps

search.query: search CellIdentity=$5gcell$ | timechart fixedrange=f span=15m min(DL_UEThroughput) as DownlinkThroughput BY CellIdentity

chart.title: $site$ - NR Average Uplink UE Throughput Kbps

search.query: search CellIdentity=$5gcell$ | timechart fixedrange=f span=15m min(UL_UEThroughput) as UplinkThroughput BY CellIdentity

chart.title: $site$ - DL PDCP Data Volume Mbps delivered to RLC layer

search.query: index=temp source=Samsung_ODS_NR_Utilisation_UPC_View | stats sum(EN_DC_DL_PDCP_SDU_Data_Volume_mbits) as Utilisation by _time, NE_NAME | fillnull value=0 | timechart fixedrange=f span=15m sum(Utilisation) as Utilisation by NE_NAME

chart.title: $site$ - RRC Connection Setup Success Rate - Min

search.query: search CELL_NUM=$4gcell$ | eval RRC_connection_setup_success_rate = if(RRC_connection_Att>0,RRC_connection_Succ/RRC_connection_Att*100,100), _time=relative_time(_time,"+15m") | timechart fixedrange=f span=15m min(RRC_connection_setup_success_rate) as RRC:ConnectionSetupSuccessRate by CELL_NUM
search CELL_NUM=$4gcell$ | eval _time=relative_time(_time,"+15m") | timechart fixedrange=f span=15m sum(RRC_connection_Att) as RRC:Attempts by CELL_NUM

search CELL_NUM=$4gcell$ | eval A = if(RRC_connection_Att>0,RRC_connection_Succ/RRC_connection_Att,1), B = if(S1_connection_Att>0,S1_connection_Succ/S1_connection_Att,1), C = if(ERAB_Att>0,ERAB_Succ/ERAB_Att,1), _time=relative_time(_time,"+15m"), ERAB_establishment_success_rate = A*B*C*100 |timechart fixedrange=f span=15m min(ERAB_establishment_success_rate) as E-RAB:EstablishmentSuccessRate by CELL_NUM

search CELL_NUM=$4gcell$ | eval ERAB_retainability = min(ERAB_retainability), _time = relative_time(_time,"+15m") | timechart fixedrange=f span=15m min(ERAB_retainability) as E-RAB:Retainability by CELL_NUM

search CELL_NUM=$4gcell$| eval A = IntraEnbSucc+InterX2OutSucc+InterS1OutSucc, B = IntraEnbAtt+InterX2OutAtt+InterS1OutAtt, _time=relative_time(_time,"+15m"), handover_success_rate = if(B >0,A/B*100,100) | timechart fixedrange=f span=15m min(handover_success_rate) as HandoverSuccessRate by CELL_NUM

chart.title: $site$ - CSFB Success Rate to UTRAN - Min

search.query: search CELL_NUM=$4gcell$| eval A = CSFBPsHoUtranSucc+CSFBRedirUtranSucc, B = CSFBPsHoUtranAtt+CSFBRedirUtranAtt, _time=relative_time(_time,"+15m"), csfb_success_rate = if(B>0,A/B*100,100) | timechart fixedrange=f span=15m min(csfb_success_rate) as CSFB:SuccessRateToUTRAN by CELL_NUM

search CELL_NUM=$4gcell$ | eval A = RlcDL_IpThroughput_kbytes * 8 * 1.024, B = RlcDL_IpThroughput_ms/1000, _time = relative_time(_time,"+15m"), dl_ue_ip_thruput_kbps = A/B | timechart fixedrange=f span=15m min(dl_ue_ip_thruput_kbps) as DL_UE_IP_IP_Thruput_kbps by CELL_NUM

search CELL_NUM=$4gcell$ | eval A = MacUL_IpThroughput_kbytes * 8, B = MacUL_IpThroughput_ms/1000, _time=relative_time(_time,"+15m"), ul_ue_ip_thruput_kbps = A/B | timechart fixedrange=f span=15m min(ul_ue_ip_thruput_kbps) as UL_UE_IP_IP_Thruput_kbps by CELL_NUM

chart.title: $site$ - DL PDCP Data Volume Mbps - Sum

search.query: search CELL_NUM=$4gcell$| eval dlpdcp_data_volume = (EnbQciDLByte * 8 )/1000, _time=relative_time(_time,"+15m") |timechart fixedrange=f span=15m sum(dlpdcp_data_volume) as DL_PDCP_DataVolume_Mbps by CELL_NUM
search CELL_NUM=$4gcell$ |timechart fixedrange=f span=15m avg(AveInterferencePowerPUSCH) as AveInterferencePowerPUSCH by CELL_NUM
